snippet.title: Sanity of Morris Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the demo and wishlist on Steam now! https://bit.ly/SanitySteam  

Sanity of Morris is a psychological horror adventure game in which you fear darkness but can’t risk exposure to the light or you’ll be caught. The game tells the story of a young man trying to stay sane in the search for his father, consumed by conspiracy theories about the government and alien signals.


----------------------- About Alterego Games ----------------------
Since 2014, Alterego Games has been delivering experiences to the busy gamer that wants to wind down for the evening or weekend.
We want to give players a digital alter ego, someone else to be. We’re an indie team that develops cinematic games perfect for losing yourself in. We focus on ambience, mystery and story. 
We are the creators of the thrilling Bloodstreet 13 and the mysterious Woven. 

We have lots of stories to tell and are excited to be working on our latest title, the psychological horror adventure: Sanity of Morris.
A game about a young man in search of his father, trying to stay sane in face of all the odds.

Find us on Facebook, Twitter or Instagram, links below.
Check out all behind the scene footage and come say hello on Discord!

-----------------------------------Links------------------------------------------
https://alteregogames.com/discord.html  - Ask us anything on Discord!
http://www.facebook.com/alteregogamesbv 
https://twitter.com/AlteregoGamesBV
https://www.instagram.com/alterego_games_nl/
https://bit.ly/SanitySteam
